channel.title: Making dll files
channel.description:
Hello there
There are a few functions that is not included in scar, but are found in the delphi language. Since I know how to make them in delphi, [u]and[/u] I read that the plugins in SCAR is made in delphi. I found hope that i "could" create a dll file including the new functions.
This is a bit farfetched. But it would help a great deal if atealst a few of my questions here could be answered.
1. How do you inlcude the dll's? (are they included automaticly if you add them in the plugins folder?)
2. whats the basics of making your fuctins into a dll?
Please be gentle. -Can

item.title: Making dll files
item.dc:creator: @Can Can
item.description:
@Can wrote:

Hello there

There are a few functions that is not included in scar, but are found in the delphi language. Since I know how to make them in delphi, and I read that the plugins in SCAR is made in delphi. I found hope that i “could” create a dll file including the new functions.

This is a bit farfetched. But it would help a great deal if atealst a few of my questions here could be answered.

  1. How do you inlcude the dll’s? (are they included automaticly if you add them in the plugins folder?)

  2. whats the basics of making your fuctins into a dll?

Please be gentle.
-Can
